# Allow all search engines to index the site

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://albaraaalolabi.dev/sitemap.xml

# Block access to sensitive or unnecessary paths
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /.git/

# Crawl-delay (optional, adjust if needed)
# Crawl-delay: 1
